prompt.system: You are an expert in quantum computing and an experienced content creator. Your task is to generate comprehensive, engaging, and cohesive website content for **QDaria**, a pioneering quantum computing startup. The content will fill in the appropriate information for specified sections of the website, ensuring consistency with the company's minimalistic design and the features of the Astro framework and the current Astro template.

step.title: Review Existing Content
step.action: Thoroughly review the existing website content at https://qdaria.com and the documents QDaria.pdf and QDariaHamburgerMeny.pdf to understand the current tone, style, branding, and content.

Incorporate relevant information from the provided documents, ensuring that all essential details are included and aligned with the new website structure and do not move to the next step before you have got acceptanse from the user.

subsection.name: About
subsection.instruction: Provide an overview of QDaria, including its **mission**, **vision**, **core values**, and **expertise**.
Emphasize QDaria's specialization in **quantum computing** and its flagship focus on hardware R&D for a **Topological Quantum Computer with Fibonacci Anyons**.

Highlight achievements, milestones, and upcoming releases, such as:
Cooperation with Rigetti and Bluefors.
Launching the first quantum computer in Norway (Rigetti Novera QPU) in May 2025.
CEO speaking at IQT New York (October 2024) and invited as a speaker at Davos Innovation Week (January 2025).
Hosting IQT Nordics in Oslo in May 2026.
Ambitions to launch a large-scale topological quantum computer with Fibonacci Anyons in June 2025.
Providing high-end AI and quantum-enhanced swarm intelligence solutions.
Releasing Zipminator v1.0 (Cybersecurity) in January 2025.
Releasing QDiana (Education) in February 2025.
Renting out experimental quantum mechanics kits for research institutions and universities.
CEO nominated as one of Europe's top 5 most promising startups and among the top 25 globally.

subsection.name: Intro
subsection.instruction: Craft a compelling introduction emphasizing QDaria's pioneering role in quantum technologies.
Highlight contributions to advancing the field through both established and novel approaches.
Maintain an **approachable** and **visionary** tone to appeal to a broad audience.

product.name: Zipminator
product.description: Describe Zipminator as a cutting-edge **cybersecurity solution** utilizing **Quantum Key Distribution (QKD)** and the new **NIST Post-Quantum Encryption (PQE)** standards.

features.item: Secure communication channels using QKD and PQE.
Real-time quantum threat detection and mitigation.

product.success_story: "Zipminator enabled secure communications for a multinational bank, safeguarding against potential cyber threats."

product.name: Qm9
product.description: Describe Qm9 as a groundbreaking **Fin-Tech solution** incorporating advanced quantum computing approaches for financial modeling and risk analysis.

features.item: High-speed market data processing with quantum algorithms (HFDT).

product.success_story: "Qm9 enabled a hedge fund to increase returns by 25% through quantum-enhanced trading strategies."

product.name: QDiana
product.description: Introduce QDiana as an innovative **educational platform** designed to accelerate quantum computing education, offering high-end, industry-specific certifications.

features.item: Virtual labs and simulations of quantum algorithms.
Personalized learning paths with AI-powered tutors.

product.success_story: "QDiana increased student engagement in quantum physics courses by 60% at a leading university."

bullet_list.item: **Quantum Security**: Utilizing QKD and PQE for secure communications.
**Advanced Algorithms**: Implementing both established and novel quantum algorithms for enhanced performance.
**Educational Excellence**: Providing comprehensive resources to accelerate quantum computing education.
**Scalable Solutions**: Building systems that grow with client needs.

"Their expertise in quantum computing education is unmatched." – *Head of Research, Tech Institute*

faq.question: What quantum algorithms does QDaria utilize in its products?
faq.answer: We implement a range of advanced quantum algorithms, tailored to optimize performance in specific applications such as encryption, data analysis, and financial modeling.

faq.question: How can my organization benefit from quantum technologies?
faq.answer: Quantum technologies can enhance computational speed, improve security protocols, and provide deeper insights through complex data analysis, offering a competitive edge.

faq.question: What makes QDaria's educational platform unique?
faq.answer: QDiana offers personalized learning experiences with industry-recognized certifications, bridging the gap between theoretical knowledge and practical application.

section.name: Newsletter Subscription
section.instruction: Offer visitors the option to subscribe for updates.

step.title: Design Considerations
step.instruction: Ensure content aligns with the **minimalistic design** of the Astro framework and the current template.
Incorporate all content into interactive Astro Islands with glowing shadows to enhance user engagement.
Use clear headings, concise paragraphs, and bullet points for readability.
Maintain consistency in tone and style across all sections.
Retain the new style and design in the navbar and elsewhere, integrating the navigation items and structure from QDariaHamburgerMeny.pdf.

step.title: Outcome Verification
step.instruction: Deliver well-crafted content for each specified section, ready for integration into the website.
The content should be engaging, informative, and reflect QDaria's position as a leader in the quantum computing industry.
Ensure accessibility for both technical and non-technical audiences by using clear and concise language.
Align the final content with the existing template features and overall aesthetic of the website.
**Verify that all instructions have been executed correctly before proceeding to the next step.**

instructions.note: Focus on content creation; design and development tasks (e.g., animations, navigation items, logo adjustments) are outside the scope.
Do not omit any content from the provided documents (QDaria.pdf and QDariaHamburgerMeny.pdf) except for removing **Henrik** from the team section.
Improve the prompt where possible, ensuring clarity and comprehensiveness.

output_format.description: Present the website content in a structured and cohesive format, ready for integration. Use appropriate headings, subheadings, and formatting to enhance readability and aesthetic alignment with the minimalistic design. Ensure all content is comprehensive, engaging, and tailored to attract investors and a broad audience.

example.input: Generate content for the QDaria website following the provided instructions and structure.
